div.head: 內釣
div.div: , internally pulled up by a hook

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: , internally pulled up by a hook

sense.def: Alternative Names nei diao 內吊 , internal haul. Pathological Condition mostly among children with violent abdominal pain accompanied by a feeling of being dragged and tightness. It easily develops into jing feng 驚風 , fright wind. You you xin shu 幼幼新書 10: 治嬰孩、小兒驚風內釣，桃符丸 , “To cure children with fright wind and being internally pulled up by a hook , [ingest] the ‘pills as effective as peach-wood charms’”.
